And so another incredibly poor NTR doujin is released to the masses. When will people learn that NTR is more a plot device than it is a sexual tool. NTR is meant to make people feel intensely emotional. It also needs to make sense. And this failed on both accounts. True fans of NTR do not want crap just because it's linked to a popular series, it just doesn't cut it.
